attributes.review: Downloading this app was the low point of 2020 for me and thatâ€™s saying something.  It wiped the data from my phone so I plugged it into my computer. My computer went black and hasnâ€™t turned on since. My daughters only wedding photos were on that laptop, pictures of grandkids, important life memories, etc. How am I supposed to make my grandmother with Alzheimerâ€™s remember her family? Our house burned down earlier this year and all the physical photos were lost, all we had left was that computer. This app also stole my credit card information and drained my bank about with trump merchandise charges. So now I have no house, belongings, photos, or money. I guess this is what you get for being a good American :(
attributes.title: Biggest mistake of my life
